class.name: Skeleton2D
class.brief_description: Skeleton for 2D characters and animated objects.
class.description: Skeleton2D parents a hierarchy of [Bone2D] objects. It is a requirement of [Bone2D]. Skeleton2D holds a reference to the rest pose of its children and acts as a single point of access to its bones.

method.name: get_bone
method.description: Returns a [Bone2D] from the node hierarchy parented by Skeleton2D. The object to return is identified by the parameter [code]idx[/code]. Bones are indexed by descending the node hierarchy from top to bottom, adding the children of each branch before moving to the next sibling.

method.name: get_bone_count
method.description: Returns the number of [Bone2D] nodes in the node hierarchy parented by Skeleton2D.

method.name: get_skeleton
method.description: Returns the [RID] of a Skeleton2D instance.
